Classes in cellularAutomata.rules used by cellularAutomata
Rule
          A function that changes a cell's state based on the states of neighboring cells.

Classes in cellularAutomata.rules used by cellularAutomata.rules
IntegerRule
          A base class for all integer-based rules (not vectors of integers, just single integers).
Life
          Rules for the game of life.
OuterTotalistic
          Creates an outer totalistic CA rule for a given lattice and rule "code".
Rule
          A function that changes a cell's state based on the states of neighboring cells.
RuleActions
          This encompasses actions that a Rule might need, like forcing a refresh of the graphics, pausing the CA, etc.
RuleNumber
          Creates an integer-based rule from a rule number specified by the user.
Spirals
          On a square (8 neighbor) lattice, this rule produces spirals that never stop unwinding.
Totalistic
          Creates a totalistic CA rule for a given lattice and rule "code".
WolframRuleNumber
          Binary rules apply to linear one-dimensional CA.
 

Classes in cellularAutomata.rules used by cellularAutomata.rules.templates

          A base class for all integer-based rules (not vectors of integers, just single integers).

          A function that changes a cell's state based on the states of neighboring cells.

          This encompasses actions that a Rule might need, like forcing a refresh of the graphics, pausing the CA, etc.
